extendedInfo.description: The only photos and videos hiding app which itself is hidden from the app menu.PicSafe is the revolutionary photos & Videos Locker which is invisible in the phone apps menu. To launch just dial #000# and press call button. The only app in the market which hides pictures and videos and is hidden itself. 100% safe from friends and family since it is not visible in the apps menu.Features: - Only app which is hidden from the apps menu. To launch just dial #000# and press call button. - The default launch code #000# can be changed from the settings. - The app is not visible in the app menu. - Hides photos and videos. Once hidden they donot appear in gallery. - Large previews of locked photos and videos. - Pinch to zoom locked photos when launched. - Directly view from locked folder without needing to unlock. - Multi select feature - Unlock and the files become available in gallery again.You will need to run the app once after installation for the hidden feature to be enabled. Phones running android versions prior to 4.0 need to reboot their phones after installation. However do remember to run the app once after installation.For app support please do mail me at nimish@mobifree.inPermissions explained:PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS -- To launch app from dialer.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE -- To hide your private pics & videos.READ_PHONE_STATE -- To launch app from dialer.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE -- Needed to display ad.INTERNET -- Needed to display ad.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE -- Needed to display ad.Please send me an email before giving this app a bad review. I fix issues immediately to give you a better experience.Keywords- ILOCK,ilock,password,hide,hidden,hider,encrypt,encryption,application, hide it pro, vaulty, key safe

reviews.title: app should ask password always
reviews.comment: in my galaxy s3 on long press of home button recent apps will open, from where  pic safe app is launching without asking password.this is great hazard to users if they forgot to delete recent apps.please fix this problem.app should ask password always.

reviews.title: Reported for loss of data
reviews.comment: Lost 2gb of files. Multiple errors during encryption, no way to hide folders, files must be hidden one at a time. Useless if you have lots of pics. Image does not display for vids, making it impossible to select files as no  file names are viewable either. Media scanner goes crazy, endlessly scanning your files over and over. Uninstalling as soon as I make sure I have some of my files.
